name: Germ Wars
description: Take control of a determined White Blood Cell on a quest for self discovery, vengeance, punishment and annihilation of all evil germs who would dare infiltrate an unsuspecting and innocent human body in this unique and organic experience.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Xp, Vista, 7, 8/8.1 Processor: 2.0 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 128mb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 2.0+ support Storage: 150 MB available space
